items.sentence: Tom is going to show us the documents this afternoon.
Tom is here to help Mary figure out her income taxes.
Tom is learning French so he can get a better salary.
Tom is looking forward to spending the day with Mary.
I canceled my appointment because of urgent business.
I asked Tom to do the same thing that Mary was doing.
I bought a flashlight, but I forgot to buy batteries.
Tom wished that he could play tennis as well as Mary.
Tom wondered how often Mary practiced baton twirling.
Tom wondered if Mary understood what she was reading.
